invocations.description: Iterates through new messages received in game, the values are stored in the variable m. For more information about messages, visit this
invocations.ex:
auto(200)
foreach newmessage m do
	if m.sender == 'Bubble' and m.content == 'sio me' then
		cast('exura sio "Bubble')
	end
end
invocations.exDescription: Will cast 'heal friend' on Bubble if she asks for it.
